text:
Influence Health | Birmingham, AL or Atlanta, GA | Security Engineer | Full-time | ONSITE

job description: http://www.influencehealth.com/career-center/?p=job%2FoeIr3f...

We are looking for a Security Engineer to join a growing team tasked with hardening infrastructure and application security across our product suite, helping create security policies/controls for the entire organization, and fostering a security first culture.

Influence Health builds software for hospitals and Healthcare Organizations in both the clinical and marketing spaces.
